fields.Title of Work: Fluting Stars: A Method Book for Young Beginniers Book 1
fields.Title of larger work (if applicable): Fluting Stars: A Method Book for Young Flute Beginners Book 1
fields.Description/Abstract: Fluting Stars 1 is based on the sound-to-symbol learning philosophy.  Building a beautiful flute sound fundamentals of flute technique, proper body awareness, and understanding music theory are key priorities in this book.  The musical content is paced according to young beginner flute students' earning abilities.  You can also customize the Key Leap Focus areas to individual students' needs.  Key Leap areas:  Treasure Chest of Sparkly Tones, Ear Detective, Notes in a Minutes, Finger Fitness, Cherry on Top, and Stellar Students.
